data.title: Notes and Recollections with The Historical Setting of the Austrian School of Economics (2013)
data.meta_description: This volume contains Mises' brief memoir Notes and Recollections he wrote just prior to migrating to the U.S. in 1940 and an essay on the history of the Austrian school of economics from 1962. His memoir is accompanied by a postscript by one of his students Hans F. Sennholz.
data.text:
Ludwig von Mises (author)

Bettina Bien Greaves (editor)

This volume contains Mises' brief memoir Notes and Recollections he wrote just prior to migrating to the U.S. in 1940 and an essay on the history of the Austrian school of economics from 1962. His memoir is accompanied by a postscript by one of his students Hans F. Sennholz.

Buy this Book
